entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No help for specific `dotnet nuget` commands #27833
  • Improvements to dotnet tool search help text #27831

Closed

  • [API Compat] Add rule to prohibit making a member virtual #18683
    Backlog
  • dotnet tools use wrong architecture of libhostfxr.dylib on Mac M1 #27761
  • Baseline package validator doesn't report renamed arguments #26797
  • Update test once runtime AOT target changes are in the SDK repo #27533

PullRequests

Created

  • Improvements to dotnet tool search help text #27832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't hardcode S.C.Immutable version #27830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add linker notification to fabricbot #27825
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [APICompat] Don't filter package assets and handle placeholder files #27822
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Produce a warning and ignore Prefer32Bit for netcoreapp #27796
  • [release/7.01xx] Remove erroneously added condition #27827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish assets immediately #27828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Porting back APICompat changes from main #27817
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [release/7.0.1xx] In build sign enable #27794
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Eliminate duplicate inputs to ComputeBlazorBuildAssets #27561
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix test to match runtime changes #27739
    Area-NativeAOT
  • Implements standard dotnet options for controlling output in dotnet new #27628
    area: dotnet new

Updated

  • Merge resolver retargeting to rc2 #27777
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1990863 #27789
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1990832 #27667
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move forward to 2.20.0 which is the latest release #27770
    Area-Infrastructure
  • changed list command example #27795
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27746
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
